Deep Learning image classifier model

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Train and Test a Deep learning image classifier with Galaxy-Ludwig](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/statistics/tutorials/galaxy-ludwig/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
